title: VNC Send Special Keys, Windows Key
author: mathewalanfisher
body_snippet:
Feature Request to be able to send the Windows Key via the Send Special Keys menu option.

I'm using RDP and the menu is located when right clicking on the connected server tab. The menu item is called "Send Special Keys (RDP)".
At present the options are Ctrl-Alt-Del and Ctrl-Esc.
Is it possible to be able to add an extra item for sending the Windows Key?

This will be useful as the Server I'm using has a hidden taskbar. Its tricky to get to the taskbar in a RDP environment when hidden.
...

comments.snippet:
You can set Key Combination to Yes under Redirect in Connection.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42204122/43967080-7c69440c-9cbb-11e8-98fa-6465071cefb3.png)
